name: English Tutorials
tag_list: learn-english, learn-english-online, online-english-school, english-tutorials, learn-english-skype, skype-english, online-english-tutor
overview:
Students can learn English online via Skype. Students can choose from any of the company’s online courses and schedule classes anytime, any day. They can learn Business English, General English, or Kids English. The online English school has customized lessons for students of all ages, level, and profession.

The method is simple yet effective. The class is always one on one with the teacher for maximum results. The student gets to practice speaking at his own pace and time.

The student’s needs and performance are regularly assessed and recorded. The teacher targets the student’s weaknesses by giving more practical exercises and immediately correcting grammatical mistakes. The student gets more exposure to the language through the website’s features and services.
